articles.author: Harry Baker
articles.title: Eclipse from space: See the moon's shadow race across North America at 1500 mph in epic satellite footage - Livescience.com
articles.description: Satellite images show the moon's gigantic shadow sweeping across North America during the April 8 total solar eclipse. Astronauts on board the ISS also captured stunning shots of the enormous dark patch.
articles.content:
Eerie new satellite images show the moon's gigantic shadow racing across North America during the April 8 total solar eclipse
. Photos captured by astronauts on board the International Space Station… [+3341 chars]
